name: BitCurator
tagline: Software produced for the BitCurator family of research projects (BitCurator, BitCurator Access, BitCurator NLP)
body:
The BitCurator group on GitHub is the primary store for all source code and development documentation developed as part of the BitCurator NLP (2016-2018), BitCurator Access (2014-2016), and BitCurator (2011-2014) projects.

## Projects

### BitCurator NLP Tools
More to come...

### BitCurator Access Webtools
https://github.com/BitCurator/bitcurator-access-webtools

### BitCurator Access Redaction Tools
https://github.com/BitCurator/bca-redtools

### BitCurator Environment
https://github.com/BitCurator/bitcurator-distro-main
https://github.com/BitCurator/bitcurator-distro-bootstrap
https://github.com/BitCurator/bitcurator-distro-adduser
https://github.com/BitCurator/bitcurator-distro-metadata

## Authors and Contributors

Kam Woods (@kamwoods)

Sunitha Misra (@sunithamisra)

Carl Wilson (@carlwilson)

Greg Jansen (@gregjansen)

## Support or Contact
User [documentation](http://wiki.bitcurator.net/) can be found on our master wiki.
